page.title: 09 EELING POND COMMON
page.content: Is much larger than Parson's Green, but there is now no sign of the pond from which it drew it's name. It is surrounded by houses that are rather smaller than those on Parsons Green and the green is more remote from the everyday commercial world.There is a large area set aside for young children to play in;it has a great variety of play equipment and it is fenced off so that dogs may not enter.There is a separate concreted area for tennis and ball games.Mothers with thier young children visit frequently and there two play schools near by.
